summary:
## University of California, Berkeley:

UC Berkeley, founded in 1868, is a top public research university in California. It has over 45,000 students and 15 schools, covering subjects from chemistry to business. Berkeley is known for its strong research, with over $1 billion in federal funding in 2021. 

Its sports teams, the Golden Bears, are very successful, winning many national championships. Berkeley has produced lots of famous alumni, including 107 Nobel laureates. It's also one of the original "Public Ivy" schools, known for excellent teaching and research.
title: University of California, Berkeley
